snippet: Some New Yorkers took it hard when they learned the mayor wanted to take away their plus-size sodas.
abstract: New Yorkers react to Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's proposed ban prohibiting the sale of any cup or bottle of sugar-sweetened drink larger than 16 fluid ounces.

byline.contributor: Michael M. Grynbaum and Alex Vadukul contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Some New Yorkers took it hard when they learned the mayor wanted to take away their plus-size sodas.

headline.seo: To Gulp or to Sip? Debating a Crackdown on Big Sugary Drinks
